product_name: Shiseido Inner Glow Cheek Powder Blush & Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I love this formula, it’s so silky and easy to blend, and the colors in the wider collection. I will say the Twilight looks more like the it does in the pan picture than in the swatch picture (I don’t think you could get it that pink), it’s like a less reflective and slightly peachier Nars Orgasm. It definitely has this lovely glow from within quality without adding any satin or shimmer finishes. My only complaint is that this is a very tiny amount of blush, and it’s not very hard pressed so it’s a bit more powdery and you use more product that in a Dior or Hourglass baked-like formula. I’m also not a fan of the packaging, which kind of comes across like I’ll-fitting/ matches cardboard and not very luxury. Also please note that while this is cheaper than other luxury brand blushes, it’s actually roughly 1/2 the size :(

product_name: Shiseido Inner Glow Cheek Powder Blush & Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: The Twilight Hour is a really pretty shade. It goes on really pretty and stays all day. I finally found a blush I love.

product_name: Shiseido Inner Glow Cheek Powder Blush & Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I purchased this on a whim, and I’m so glad I did! It’s beautiful, long lasting, and easy to work with. It seems that some reviewers are under the mistaken impression that these are blushes. They are not. The only two that would work as a blush, on most skin tones, are Twilight Hour and Berry Dawn. Solar Haze is a great blush topper, lid color, and highlight. It has just a hint of a peachy base color that gives your a healthy glowing flush to your skin. Shimmering Champagne is beautiful too. It has almost no base color, so it can be enjoyed by almost everyone. If you read the description, and know what you’re purchasing, you won’t be disappointed.

review_content: This wasn’t what I expected it to be, however, I find myself really enjoying this. I use this as a blush topper. product_name: Shiseido Inner Glow Cheek Powder Blush & Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
Man, this color is gorgeous. Hands down, super elegant. Shiseido definitely hit it out of the park and tried to be innovative. The formula is great quality, gives my cheeks some color, and doesn’t feel tacky on the skin at all. I’m still trying out this product, but so far, I’m really impressed. This product has become a part of my everyday routine! I’ve also gotten many compliments on this product as well. If you’re looking for something crazy dramatic, this product will not be your cup of tea. However, if you’re looking for something subtle and sophisticated, you gotta try it out! The pricing isn’t bad too, considering that this is a luxury brand. Still shocked that shiseido came out with makeup! Can’t wait to see what else is in store.
